user.login_text: Enter you email and password to login.
user.check_email: Please check your email to access your secure link.
user.enter_to_create: Enter your email to create new wallet.
user.by_registering: By registering you agree to our
user.enter_password_text: Enter the password you would like to use with your wallet.
user.pass_text: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols.
user.enter_recovery: Enter your Recovery phrase to create new password.

wallet.only_way: This is only way to reset your password!
wallet.cant_recovered: Your PBG tokens cantâ€™s be recovered without it
wallet.strongly_recomended: It is strongly recommended that you store backups of your recovery phrase in physically separate, offline environment. Do not share it with anyone else.
wallet.please_enter: Please enter the words from your Recovery Phrase in the required order.
wallet.go_copy: Go back to copy my recovery phrase
wallet.have_to_backup: You have to backup your recovery phrase. It is strongly recommended to store the backup copies in physically separate, offline environment. If someone were to find your recovery phrase they could access your wallet.
wallet.pvk_text: your private key could be here but it wouldn't make sense.
wallet.recovery_tooltip: If someone were to find your recovery phrase they could access your wallet.
wallet.your_recovery_phrase: your recovery phrase could be here but it wouldn't make sense.
wallet.public_key_tultip: Public key is your address to receive tokens.
wallet.pvk_tooltip: If someone were to find your private key they could access your wallet.
wallet.public_key_desc: Your address can also be known as you public key. It is what you share with people so they can send you tokens.
wallet.enter_pass: Enter your password to backup your Recovery Phrase.
wallet.enter_pass_see: Enter your password to see your Recovery Phrase.
wallet.recovery_text: If someone were to find your recovery phrase they could access your wallet. It is strongly recommended to store your recovery phrase in physically separate, offline environment.
wallet.recover_only_way: Your recovery phrase is the only way to reset your web wallet password.
wallet.next_step_text: In the next step, you will need to enter four words from the recovery phrase in a random order.
wallet.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to postpone your Recovery Phrase backup?
wallet.in_case_text: In case you press 'Yes' and forget your password until next login, there will be no way to restore your wallet.
wallet.enter_pass_pvk: Enter your password to backup your Private Key.
wallet.enter_pass_pvk_see: Enter your password to see your Private Key.
wallet.have_to_backup_pvk: You have to backup your recovery phrase. It is strongly recommended to store the backup copies in physically separate, offline environment. If someone were to find your recovery phrase they could access your wallet.
wallet.enter_to_make_transaction: Enter your password to make transaction.
wallet.no_way_cancel: Please note, there is no way to cancel confirmed transaction.

error.system_error: It seems you already have a EVE Wallet, please try to login.
